name: DarkDrop
description: DarkDrop enables irreversible, anonymous value transfers on Solana mainnet using temporary burner keypairs. The sender funds a freshly generated keypair and receives a claim code (base58 private key or AES-encrypted variant). The receiver imports the burner, sweeps funds to their main wallet, and the burner is discarded. Operational privacy depends on sender using a disposable wallet for funding. Mathematical privacy extensions (Token-2022 confidential transfers + Light Protocol) are on the public roadmap.
